name: 3.1 - Ensure installation complies with Electrical regulations and GHD specification (whichever more stringent)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to livening up Electrical board
Acceptance Criteria - Installation in compliance with Electrical Regulations
3.2 - Ensure the Mechanical Installation is installed in accordance with the Drawings & Specification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to system testing & flushing
Acceptance Criteria - All items are as per specified and installed to best trade practice
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Switchboard modifications carried out, livened, subcircuits isolated
Acceptance Criteria - switchboard mounted controls operate as expected
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - motors installed and terminated
Acceptance Criteria - confirmation of correct wiring configuration.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - VSD's not energised
Acceptance Criteria - Power supply to VSDs correct as per supply/design
Verifying Document - electrical drawings for site.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - VSD's powered up, before test running.
Acceptance Criteria - VSD's set up correctly for motors connected.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - VSD's configured, set to run at low speed
Acceptance Criteria - Motor Rotates in correct direction
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - motor operation confirmed, water in system.
Acceptance Criteria - controls operate as expected, e-stops do not automatically reset upon release.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - PLC Installed, outputs made to a safe state,
Acceptance Criteria - Verification of input and output operations. verification of analogue input operation
4.8 - Commissioning of swing check valve microswitch
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check valves installed
Acceptance Criteria - Signals verified to PLC
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pressure transducers installed, no pressure on system
Acceptance Criteria - Pressure transducers read as expected, output to plc verified and range confirmed. Verified against external gauge.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Open Valves slowly on suction & discharge side of pump
Acceptance Criteria - Bleed pumps and any high points in pipework
4.11 - Turn on pump 1 - Check for correct operation
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pressure transducers and flow meters installed, pressurised system
Acceptance Criteria - Correct operation of instrumentation (Flowmeter & pressure transducer)
4.12 - Turn on pump 2 - Check for correct operation
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pressure transducers and flow meters installed, pressurised system
Acceptance Criteria - Correct operation of instrumentation (Flowmeter & pressure transducer)
5.1 - Water supply is un interrupted and purged of any air
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Bleed of entrained air
Acceptance Criteria - Wet well is full
5.2 - Controls systems are operational and functioning as intended as per the Functional Description
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Automation functionality verification
Acceptance Criteria - As per GHD design
5.3 - Pumps are operating correctly and changeover as per the control strategy.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Automation functionality verification
Acceptance Criteria - As per GHD design
5.4 - Pump flow is achieving the expected flow rate. Flow rate recorded and provided to Engineer
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Correct setup of VSD
Acceptance Criteria - Flow rate matches design data
5.5 - System successfully communicating with DCC network
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - RTU communicating
Acceptance Criteria - Connectivity to client network
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Verification form Client
5.6 - DCC Water technicians attend for operation & handover. Client Instruction
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Operator attendance
Acceptance Criteria - Acceptance by DCC Operations
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Verification form Client
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Commissioning complete, system in operation
Acceptance Criteria - Installation complete, all technical data obtained
Verifying Document - Published Operation & Maintenance Manuals
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Review of Documents
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Commissioning complete, system in operation
Verifying Document - Red-Line Mark up Drawings
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Review of Documents
